title: Need a clash team for Tomorrow?

embed.description: Check out the Bu: League OCE community on Discord - hang out with 383 other members and enjoy free voice and text chat.

body:
I've seen that a lot of people are struggling to find clash teams on short notice. Feel free to join my discord, there are lots of people looking for teams/players. Hope everyone can find the people they need for tomorrow's clash!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
